926020.name: Natural Selection 2 - Catalyst Pack
926020.description:
Show your support for NS2 Development with the purchase of this special limited time offer DLC. Purchase of this DLC pack will get you our newest and unique skins for both the Marine and Alien classes, plus over the next few months of development anyone that owns this DLC will unlock future items at no additional cost!

An Elite TSF Marine unit codenamed: SANDSTORM, has been deployed to the battle field in an effort to stop a new evolution of the Kharaa. Almost Toxic in nature, this new Kharaa body type is like nothing seen before. Reports talk of emissive green glows reported in the battlefield only add to the creepy and still unknown nature of this evolution.
926020.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 芬兰语, 罗马尼亚语, 瑞典语, 捷克语
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 已启用 Valve 反作弊保护
